extDesc.message: Save frequently-entered text for pasting later.

cmdDesc.message: Paste a clipping using its shortcut key

msgUnavail.message: The selected action is not available right now.

msgNoTextSel.message: No text was selected. Please select text first.

msgBrwsWndNotFocused.message: Please return to the browser window and try again.

msgClpgNotFound.message: Unable to find the selected clipping!

msgNoActvBrwsTab.message: Unable to paste clipping because there is no active browser tab.

msgRetryPgBusy.message: The page is currently busy. Wait for the page to finish, and then try again.

msgRetryPgNotLoaded.message: Unable to retrieve selected text. Reload the page, and then try again.

msgUnknown.message: No help is available (so leave me alone).

welcCurrUsrDesc.message: Bring your clippings over from a previous version of Clippings.

welcNewUsrDesc.message: Learn the essential features of Clippings in just a few minutes.

welcImportDesc.message: To get started, click Browse, then locate the backup file on your system.

welcNoBackupExpand.message: What to do if you didn't create a backup

welcNoBackupSubh.message: If you didn't back up your clippings, follow these steps:

welcFileMgrWindows.description: File manager application on Windows, for locating Clippings backup folder

welcFileMgrMac.description: File manager application on macOS, for locating Clippings backup folder

welcFileMgrGeneric.message: the file manager on your system

welcShowBkupFileNote.message: (You may need to use the command line to see this folder.)
welcShowBkupFileNote.description: Note to Linux and macOS users about showing hidden backup folder.

welcNoBackupInstrxnStep1.message: Use $1 to find the Clippings data source location. Depending on your previous settings, it may be your Firefox profile folder, or another folder located elsewhere.

welcNoBackupInstrxnStep2.message: Open the data source folder and locate the Clippings backup folder. It should be named "clippings-backup" or ".clipbak". $1

welcNoBackupInstrxnStep3.message: Open the Clippings backup folder and locate the most recent backup file. Copy this to your Desktop or Documents folder.

welcNoBackupInstrxnStep4.message: Click Browse above, and then select the backup file.

welcReadyImport.message: When ready, click Import to bring your Clippings data over to Clippings 6.

welcImportConfirmDone.message: Your clippings have been successfully imported. Clippings is now ready to use.

welcShctKeyNote.message: The Clippings keyboard paste key has changed in Clippings 6. To paste a clipping by its shortcut key or to search by name, press $1.

welcImportError.message: Error reading selected file.  The file may not be a valid Clippings file.

welcImportRetry.message: Click Try Again to go back and select another backup file.

welcLeaveConfirm.message: Are you sure you want to leave the Welcome to Clippings page?

welcImportLater.message: You can import your clippings backup later by opening Clippings Manager and then selecting Tools → Import.

welcCantImportHdg.message: Clippings can't import the backup file, because the Clippings database is not accessible.

welcCantImportCause.message: This may happen if the privacy settings in Firefox are too restrictive (for example, turning on Private Browsing mode).  These settings can interfere with WebExtensions such as Clippings.

welcCantImportFix.message: Make sure that the browser's privacy settings are at their defaults, then restart Firefox and try again. If this doesn't fix it, follow these steps:

welcCantImportFixStep1.message: Open the Firefox menu and select Help → Troubleshooting Information.

welcCantImportFixStep2.message: Click Refresh Firefox, then follow the prompts. Firefox will restart.

welcCantImportFixStep3.message: Reinstall Clippings, and then try importing the backup file again.

labelCreateClippingOptions.description: Button to expand clipping options (source URL, label) in New Clipping dialog

labelSaveSrcURL.message: Save the address of the source web page

labelLabel.description: Label for the Clipping label menu

shortcutKeyHint.message: To quickly paste this clipping into a web page textbox in Firefox, press $1 followed by the shortcut key.

initError.message: Clippings doesn't work when the privacy settings in Firefox are too restrictive, such as turning on Private Browsing mode.  Try changing these settings back to their defaults, then restart Firefox and try again.

saveClippingError.message: Unable to save the new clipping.  Check that the privacy settings in Firefox are not too restrictive (such as turning on Private Browsing mode), then restart Firefox and try again.

shortcutKeyDesc.message: Press the shortcut key of the clipping you want to paste.

expHTMLTitle.description: HTML export of shortcut key list - page title

expHTMLShctKeyInstrxn.message: To paste a clipping into a web page textbox in Firefox, press ALT+SHIFT+Y (Command+Shift+Y on macOS), then the shortcut key.

expHTMLShctKeyCustNote.message: NOTE: The shortcut key prefix (default keys ALT+SHIFT+Y or Command+Shift+Y) may be different depending on your Clippings settings.

plchldrPromptMultiDesc.message: Enter the values for the following placeholders.

clipMgrSrchBarHint.description: Clippings Manager search bar hint text

clipMgrIntroDesc.message: Use Clippings Manager to edit, rename or delete clippings, and organize your collection of clippings into folders.

clipMgrNameHint.description: Clippings Manager - clipping name textbox hint text

clipMgrContentHint.description: Clippings Manager - clipping content textarea hint text

clipMgrIntroCmdDel.description: Clippings Manager intro - key binding description

clipMgrIntroCmdClearSrchBar.description: Clippings Manager intro - key binding description

clipMgrIntroCmdSrch.description: Clippings Manager intro - key binding description

clipMgrIntroCmdClose.description: Clippings Manager intro - key binding description

clipMgrIntroCmdUndo.description: Clippings Manager intro - key binding description

clipMgrIntroCmdShowIntro.description: Clippings Manager intro - key binding description

clipMgrIntroCmdMaximize.description: Clippings Manager intro - key binding description

clipMgrRemoveSrcURLsConfirm.message: Removed source web page addresses from your clippings.

clipMgrShortcutHelpInstrxn.message: To paste a clipping from the list below into a web page textbox in Firefox, press $1, then the shortcut key.

clipMgrShortcutKeyAssigned.message: The selected shortcut key has already been assigned to another clipping.  Please select a different shortcut key.

clipMgrNoSrcURL.message: The selected clipping doesn't have a source web page address.

clipMgrExportConfirm.message: Clippings export to "$1" is successfully completed.

clipMgrWarnRemoveSrcURLs.message: All source web page addresses of your clippings will be removed.  Do you want to continue?

custPlchldrValDesc.message: Separate multiple default values with a “|” symbol. Example: red|green|blue

numPlchldrDesc.message: Each time the clipping is pasted, the value of this placeholder will automatically increase by one, until the placeholder is reset from the Clippings toolbar button context menu.

backupError.message:
Sorry, an error occurred while creating the backup file.

Details:
$1

warnBackupOverwrite.message: Restoring from a backup file will replace all of your clippings with the backup. This action can't be undone.

importError.message: Error reading selected file. The file may not be a valid Clippings file.

labelSelExportFmt.message: Select a format to export clippings to:

expFmtClippings6Desc.message: The default format for backing up and exchanging Clippings data with other users or multiple computers.  Requires Clippings 5.5 or newer installed.

expFmtHTMLDocDesc.message: Exports your Clippings data as an HTML document for printing or display in a web browser.

expFmtCSVDesc.message: Use the Comma-Separated Values (CSV) format to exchange Clippings data with other applications. Only clipping names and content are exported.

cbExpInclSrcURLs.message: Include source web page addresses of clippings

errMoveToSameParent.message: Item already exists in the selected folder.
errMoveToSameParent.description: Error message when attempting to move clipping/folder to the same parent folder

errMoveToSubfldr.message: Cannot move or copy to the selected folder.
errMoveToSubfldr.description: Error message when attempting to move or copy a folder into a subfolder of itself

labelPasteOptions.message: When pasting an HTML-formatted clipping into a rich text edit box:

pasteOptRawHTML.message: Paste as plain text, preserving HTML tags

cbAutoLineBreak.message:
Automatically break lines unless

or
tags exist

htmlPasteDesc.message: An HTML-formatted clipping will always be pasted as plain text if pasting into a plain textbox, or if the clipping contains restricted tags such as <script>, <applet>, <object>, <iframe>, etc.

prefsShortcutMode.message: Activate shortcut key mode by pressing these keys:

prefsShortcutKeyNote.message: Some of the available shortcut keys may already be assigned to Firefox commands.

prefsDefaultNumPlchldrStart.message: Default starting value for auto-incrementing placeholders:

cbAlwaysSaveSrcURL.message: Always save the address of the source web page

backupNotifyMsg.message: Keep your clippings safe by doing regular backups. Click here to back up your clippings now.

backupNotifyFirstMsg.message: Keep your clippings safe by doing regular backups. Click here to back up your clippings and set up backup reminders.

backupFirstDesc.message: Keep your clippings safe by doing regular backups. Take a moment to backup your clippings by clicking Backup Now.

backupHint.message: You can also backup your clippings anytime from Clippings Manager. Just open Clippings Manager, and then select Tools → Backup.

backupPrefsHint.message: This setting can also be changed in Clippings preferences.

syncPushAck.message: Pushed updates to Synced Clippings folder.

deleteSyncFldr.message: The Synced Clippings folder cannot be deleted, because Sync Clippings is turned on.

moveSyncFldr.message: The Synced Clippings folder cannot be moved.

syncPushFailed.message: Unable to push changes to the Synced Clippings folder, because the connection to the Sync Clippings helper app has failed. To fix this, reinstall the Sync Clippings helper app.

syncStartupFailed.message: Unable to update your synced clippings, because the connection to the Sync Clippings helper app has failed. To fix this, reinstall the Sync Clippings helper app.
